codeSystems.name: MyCareNetAgreementErrors
codeSystems.title: CodeSystem agreement errors
codeSystems.description:
Errors in the agreement flows of MyCareNet. These values were delivered by the 
NIC(Nationaal Intermutualistisch College)/CIN(Collège Intermutualiste National.) Not all codes are defined here, a full list can be found on mycarenet.be.

codeSystems.description:
Decision values in the agreement flows of MyCareNet. These values were delivered by the 
NIC(Nationaal Intermutualistisch College)/CIN(Collège Intermutualiste National.) The codes are not defined here, a full list can be found on mycarenet.be.

codeSystems.name: MyCareNetMessageEvents

codeSystems.description: Message events for MyCareNet flows.Not all codes are defined here, a full list can be found on mycarenet.be

codeSystems.name: NIHDIPhysiotherapyPathologySituationCode
codeSystems.title: CodeSystem NIHDIPhysiotherapyPathology
codeSystems.description: Legal pathology situation codes as defined by NIHDI to be used in the pathology registration flows of MyCareNet. These values are managed by NIHDI. The codes are not defined here. Consult the cookbooks on mycarenet.be for concrete usage instructions.

codeSystems.name: MyCareNetRefusalValues
codeSystems.title: CodeSystem refusal values
codeSystems.description:
Refusal values in the agreement flows of MyCareNet. These values were delivered by the 
NIC(Nationaal Intermutualistisch College)/CIN(Collège Intermutualiste National.)

NIC(Nationaal Intermutualistisch College)/CIN(Collège Intermutualiste National.)
